attributes.title: so awful 🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review:
when i downloaded the app, the first thing it did was give me a virus that made me put american flags and oranges in between every word. thankfully i got it fixed, but it 🇺🇸🍊 still 🇺🇸🍊 happens 🇺🇸🍊 eventually. then it gave me a trivia question about trump. normally i’d be fine with this because i know all about how corrupt and fascist he actually is. but this question was so hard! it said:

FINISH THE SENTENCE: 

Trump is a ______ist

a. racist
b. rapist
c. sexist

it’s a really hard question because i know he’s all of them! if there was an “all of the above” option, i would have chosen it. 

but other that that, no complaints.

attributes.title: Worst app in the world!!!
attributes.review: this app took weeks to download and all the news on the app is just crappy as hell I don't recommend getting it plus you have to make multiple multiple payments from news you can see for free on your TV so I recommend to get some thing else another app or just watch news on the TV !!!!!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app should be deleted from the App Store immediately!!! DONT VOTE FOR THE FAT ORANGE CHEETO PUFF🍊🤮!! He is ruining our country and making it a disaster. How can people support a guys who r*cists, r*pist, anti- feminist, supports sexual assault and many more!!🤮🤮🤮 Tr*mp will kill us all he don’t care about us besides himself and money. Please vote for what’s right and make a change and don’t vote that thing to be president for another 4 years 🤦🏾‍♂️.

attributes.title: This app is so glitchy
attributes.review: This app took forever to download, and every time I kept opening it, it kept kicking me out. Also the software was really low running and it took a while to download, plus the app is assuming that America was great before trump was great before. Also I have very good internet so downloading shouldn’t be a problem for me.

attributes.title: Stupid
attributes.review: this app has taken hours to download and once it finally did it made my phone glitch to the MAX😡 then i started getting random calls from app software companies telling me i’m ugly! this app needs to be taken down immediately or the rats will come to eat my family. you don’t want the rats to eat my family do you?

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I was looking for important news about how President Trump would be responding to the crises of the world in his second term. Instead, I was bombarded with vile content, associated with hate speech, and, to top it all off, spammed. This app is just an abysmal mess. I cannot imagine any reasonable human leaving it on their phone. Terrible. Just truly awful in every way.

attributes.title: we stan some hot garbage 👁👅👁
attributes.review:
firstly, the app is plain ugly and needs some redesign, but so does everyone in the white house so 🤷‍♀️. but after downloading, i began to wonder why my room started to smell🤢. then i realized, that the smell was the stench of ✨racist✨pedophilic✨rodents✨ who dont know when to quit all their senseless bs. and the great pumpkins wide, wrinkly face is everywhere in the app and it has had some drastic effects on my mental health😓🎃. everytime i look at that thing i just get feral and feel the desire to convert to cannibalism👀. i believe that it would be of your best interest to remove this app, as it is toxic trash run by toxic trash😞😝. 

thanks queens✌️🏽

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app looking for something good the president has done for this country just to find out that he hates all the minorities in this country. which is unfortunate because i am a minority. i then proceeded to click a link which took me to an extreme porn site. me and my children are scarred from this experience and i cant afford therapy.

attributes.title: Crashes every time
attributes.review: First off, yes I am an eligible voter so no these bad reviews aren’t just “ignorant kids.” I downloaded this app to try to stay informed on all sides of politics. However, the app crashes every time I open it. It’s no wonder trump supporters are all so uninformed:/ Fix the app and all of its many, many issues as other reviews have stated as well please.

attributes.title: No good.
attributes.review: This app might be the worst one on my phone it takes forever to download, and when it finally did download there were ads almost every times I clicked something, and some of them were even Biden 2020 ads.  These ads also created a virus on most of my devices. I did not sign up for this.
